task-time-calculator.name: Task Time Calculator
task-time-calculator.details: A web app for tracking and managing time spent on tasks. Users can add tasks, run timers, and review accumulated time to optimize productivity. With real-time updates to ensure a error free experience.

form-builder.name: Form Builder
form-builder.details: A web app for creating Salesforce Pardot forms with a click-to-add interface. Users can build, preview, and export structured forms for an easy integration into marketing workflows.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
portfolio.details: My portfolio site showcasing my work in front-end development and UI/UX design. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

webflow-project-1.name: MIT Professional Education
webflow-project-1.details: High-impact Webflow landing page for MIT Professional Education AI & ML course. Designed to clearly present program highlights, enrollment details, and instructor insights, with responsive layout and modern visual hierarchy.

webflow-project-2.name: Affirm SBM Webinar
webflow-project-2.details: Webflow-built landing page for Affirm Small Business Management webinar. Features a clean, conversion-focused layout with custom form integration, session overview, and speaker highlights.

webflow-project-3.name: Sciton Webinar Archive
webflow-project-3.details: Webflow landing page designed for Scitonâ€™s on-demand video archive. Includes a gated video library, organized by category, with a professional, branded layout and embedded form access.
